website_summaries.verdict: Not everyone likes bold espresso, and these capsules appeal to those consumers thanks to the mild, sweet blend that is great on its own or combined with cream.
pros: Differs from most traditional espresso brews, as Voltesso boasts mild flavor with a bit of sweetness
Milk or cream goes nicely with the delicate taste
cons: shots, and some consumers wish the capsules made larger brews
Not a good pick for espresso connoisseurs who prefer dark, full-bodied shots

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: Fake! These are not real. They are all floating around in the box. Not like normal packaging. Print is different on the pods. Barely enough coffee in pod to make a cup. Not sure it’s even coffee. This is scary. Come on people, if you are going to fake it, at least give it a better effort.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Don’t purchase in bulk!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We purchase our “pods” through amazon all of the time... so we got a larger pack to save $$ - well... bad idea it was like these were expired. All. Of. Them. It was so frustrating, they would brew out a teaspoon of espresso each. Giant waste of our money. I will try again - but not the larger quantity orders.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Taste great, arrived same-day w/ >7 mo. shelf life left
customer_reviews.text: These make great espresso if you have a VertuoLine type machine. It's a light roast, which is not to say that it isn't a strong coffee, rather it gives it a nice flavor and as much or slightly more caffeine compared to a darker roast. In my case these were delivered the day I ordered them and the packaging was in good shape. The production date was 4 mo. 10 days before I got them and the "best before" date is 7 mo. 16 days from the day they arrived—plenty of time for fifty espressos.
customer_reviews.author: Clive

customer_reviews.title: Legit Vertuo Espresso
customer_reviews.text: This product matches the quality, flavor, and packaging of the products ordered directly from Nespresso. Flavor-wise, it's the most mild espresso in the Vertuo lineup with a delightfully light nuttiness. Each brewed cup contains about 85 mg caffeine, if you care to know. I recommend this as a 'break-through' beverage for those who drink coffee but think that an espresso is "too strong" to enjoy. One of these with a small cookie or chocolate is heaven!
customer_reviews.author: Dale Alan

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite espresso
customer_reviews.text: We have a Viruoline Nespresso machine and love this espresso. It is better to buy in bulk because it brings the price down to 85 cents a pod. Definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Travel_girl

customer_reviews.title: Great Flavor and a great way to kickstart my day. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the ease of these Pods for my nespresso machine. I will never go to Starbucks nor use another espresso maker again. These pods are extremely flavorful and provide the energy i need to kickstart my day. WOULD recommend and WILL be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor J.

customer_reviews.title: Saving a lot of money on coffee!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, not overpowering with decent caffeine content. I have been drinking the Nespresso Altissio (purple color) before these ones, but I switched over to the Voltesso for the taste. Product comes well packaged with no issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Great Espresso !
customer_reviews.text: Love these pods- they are great for my daily cup of espresso or cappuccino. The price was very good as well, much cheaper then buying each pack individually.
customer_reviews.author: Nobo323

customer_reviews.title: What we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: Expensive and hard to recycle (we get the bags from the company - hope they dispose of them properly on their end) but this is our favorite nespresso flavor and it brews nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: I love this coffe
customer_reviews.text: The Coffee maker was a gift from my mother and this is the best Coffee The one I like!! VOLTESSO !!
customer_reviews.author: LUGANOMAN

customer_reviews.title: Better than Starbucks
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor! I’m obsessed with how good the quality of Nespresso coffee is. I used to go to Starbucks every day, sometimes twice a day, and now that I buy these that taste better than my Starbucks macchiato or latte, I have stopped my u healthy Starbucks addiction.
customer_reviews.author: Jelena Petrovic

customer_reviews.title: Java anyone
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite pod of the brand. I usually have a double Very smooth and I actually like it better than the commercial locations I frequented prior to this purchase. Great choice...
customer_reviews.author: jo

customer_reviews.title: First disappointment in years and years
customer_reviews.text: This is the first batch that the name wasn’t showing on the pods and my machine sounded like it was grinding metal, the tops were so thick.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Best value for Nespresso Vertuoline espresso
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered this assortment on average every 6 weeks for a year now. Best value for Nespresso Vertuoline. Contains five boxes of 10 capsules each (so 50 total). Contains either two blue- and three purple-capsule espressos or vice-versa.
customer_reviews.author: Guinness Hunter

customer_reviews.title: mild espresso
customer_reviews.text: Really like this espresso, it's milder than the other ones i've tried but still strong enough to get multiple uses out of one pod, maybe 2 presses before it gets too watered down. Love these, wish there were other cheaper brands that made these pods, but still cheaper than buying at coffee shops.
customer_reviews.author: ss.lee

customer_reviews.title: YUM! ☕️
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite Nespresso flavors! When I ordered, I got free, same day shipping, which was awesome because I was out of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Brainin

customer_reviews.title: Great taste but a bit expensive
customer_reviews.text: Great taste, not bad for a good afternoon coffee without getting over caffeinated. I give 4 stars because of the price. It would be a 5 stars if it was cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Julio M.

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfied customer!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been purchasing this product for quite a while now but this last time all the pods came “distorted” in it’s round shape. I had to hold each one and try to reshape each one so the Nespresso machine could read it. Unsatisfied
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Voltesso Expresso - level 4
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to pod for every morning coffee. I use the decaf pods after one cup (two pods) of Voltesso espresso. The intensity level is four which works good when you have a sensitive stomach like I have.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Brown

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Great for an afternoon single shot if you're trying to not overdo the coffee but need a quick pick-me-up.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Bitter
customer_reviews.text: Too bitter tasting for my husband and I, definitely liked the darker roasts better. Won't be repurchasing this roast.
customer_reviews.author: bri

customer_reviews.title: Expired or Unerfilled
customer_reviews.text: Most of the pods wouldn’t work in the machine and the ones that did only produced very little espresso. Additionally, they were just loose in the box unlike others from nespresso that were nicely packaged. They appear to me to be after-market or fake.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but expensive
customer_reviews.text: It's very good but expensive compare to the previous version of capsules
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Product Did Not Match Description
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these capsules from this listing, however, the Diavolitto flavor was delivered. They are definitely not interchangable, as the Diavolitto is a very dark roast. Amazon offered a refund, however, just beware that the product isn't as described.
customer_reviews.author: KWarden

customer_reviews.title: These are loose pods in the box
customer_reviews.text: I guess this is my bad - been buying Nespresso pods for over 4 years - have NEVER had them come lose in the box - always before they came in a dispenser that fits in the Nespresso rack. Won't buy them again, wish they'd been a little more upfront about the packaging -
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mild flavor
customer_reviews.text: This works fine, however as I like stronger flavors, I found it on a weaker side. Perhaps should have read the instructions better. If you like bolder flavors, stick to blue or purple
customer_reviews.author: val

customer_reviews.title: I love Nespresso products. I prefer this milder coffee, but they have lots of fabulous flavors.
customer_reviews.text: I love Nespresso products. I prefer this milder coffee, but they have lots of fabulous flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Dooks

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great price, shipped quickly and had a good long expiry date (6 months into the future). I would order again
customer_reviews.author: BSas

customer_reviews.title: Great machine and Espresso
customer_reviews.text: We love our Nespresso machine and fine the Espresso pods the best for the morning !
customer_reviews.author: kitty

customer_reviews.title: Espresso
customer_reviews.text: Good coffie, not overpowering with decent caffeine content. My favorite espresso capsules
customer_reviews.author: Django

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Value
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered these before and will continue to do so. They are easy and flavorful...perfect for a cup of latte in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: SWVegas

customer_reviews.title: Tried something new, but this isn't for me.
customer_reviews.text: It kind of has a watered down taste - disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Nespresso is a great machine and the favor is what you would expect ...
customer_reviews.text: Nespresso is a great machine and the favor is what you would expect from a premium coffee. Just wish these was available in store instead of the tasteless K Cups.
customer_reviews.author: JLeuschen

customer_reviews.title: It's worth it for the caffeine content:)
customer_reviews.text: On point. High caffeine... very high.. very very very high
customer_reviews.author: Anthony oliver

customer_reviews.title: Caffé, Yum
customer_reviews.text: They're good and creamy, almost too creamy. I make a doppio using the same pod.
customer_reviews.author: JSTAUD

customer_reviews.title: Delish
customer_reviews.text: I used to drink the intensity 9, which is great as well, but this is just smooth, mellow and delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are shipping with pods outside of normal inside sleeve packaging
customer_reviews.text: The pods seemed ok without being in the sleeves they usually come in. they are floating about inside the boxes, but seem to be undamaged and all 10 pods accounted for in the last order of 5 boxes I had shipped in June. Maybe they got a good deal on the shipment? If so, I'd like to see a price adjustment for that.
customer_reviews.author: K Family

customer_reviews.title: Pods great but way to expensive
customer_reviews.text: Wish the machine used the old type of pods. These pods are excellent but way to expensive. May buy a different machine.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Delicious but wasteful
customer_reviews.text: I wish there was a way to be less wasteful with the pods
customer_reviews.author: MegAn Boylan

customer_reviews.title: good coffee; shipping needs work
customer_reviews.text: Half of pods arrived not usable - box was completely smashed and so were pods inside.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Kelley

customer_reviews.title: as usual this is great
customer_reviews.text: love the nespresso, will buy it again, and other flavors, fast shipped
customer_reviews.author: Zsuzsi

customer_reviews.title: So far my husband’s favorite
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this product. We keep it in our home office.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Light Espresso taste. Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good espresso for those who like a light espresso taste. Not as strong as other pods I’ve gotten. Not high in caffeine
customer_reviews.author: Erika Fajardo

customer_reviews.title: It is very lite and smooth.
customer_reviews.text: It is very lite and smooth. If you are looking something to drink at night and don't want to affect your sleeping than this cafe is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Fatih Ozturk

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive
customer_reviews.text: The taste is decent. The price not so much and you cannot third party capsules
customer_reviews.author: icaro

customer_reviews.title: Within two or three days they are at my door steps.
customer_reviews.text: Love my espresso coffee. Fast delivery, and the price is right. Thank you😋
customer_reviews.author: Ant

customer_reviews.title: A good starter!
customer_reviews.text: Light and sweet just like the description. Goes great with milk. Good value. Wifey loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Leche

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage. These cannot be legitimate Nespresso pods. Only gives you an ounce of coffee Per pod and did not taste anything like quality of actual Nespresso. Do not purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love coffee
customer_reviews.text: Love the coffee. Price is a bit steep to be having daily.
customer_reviews.author: mercy

customer_reviews.title: Voltesso
customer_reviews.text: Voltesso is my fav flavor so far. I’m looking for mild sweet flavor. I run it thru Machine twice otherwise too strong. Ty
customer_reviews.author: Cathy legrand

customer_reviews.title: So good
customer_reviews.text: Love this espresso. Light, mild to moderate flavor. Only kind we drink. I enjoy a moderate espresso with cream or milk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing flavor
customer_reviews.text: Flavor is amazing. Glad I switched from keurig. Well worth the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Thomason

customer_reviews.title: Delicious & Fresh!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this flavor! I have drank this almost every morning for the last year and still love it. Very smooth.
customer_reviews.author: ichase

customer_reviews.title: Nespresso delivered. It’s the best.
customer_reviews.text: So happy to not have to go to the mall for coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Mayo69a

customer_reviews.title: Great lattes
customer_reviews.text: Just wish it was a bit less expensive, but it is delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Manetta

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute best coffee in the business i recommend that everyone gets it
customer_reviews.author: levid hakimian

customer_reviews.title: Low roast, high caffeine, great taste.
customer_reviews.text: I buy them about once a month, out of all the ones I have tried this I'd my favorite. At least until this brand makes a reusable pod for it.
customer_reviews.author: alyssa orlando

customer_reviews.title: Price is right!
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor and the quantity for the price is great.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect balance in taste
customer_reviews.text: I'm not one of those "bold" coffee drinkers. Can't stand bitter/sour taste and usually end up dumping a lot of sugar just to mask the sourness. Don't get me wrong, voltesso is NOT sweet it is still espresso of course, but it is not as bitter as the others, and way smoother. I'd definitely recommend getting this
customer_reviews.author: Maheen

product_meta.title: Nespresso Capsules VertuoLine, Voltesso , Mild Roast Espresso Coffee, 50 Count Coffee Pods, Brews 1.35oz
product_meta.description: Style:Coffee| Flavor Name:Voltesso| Size:10 Count (Pack of 5)Lightly roasted, Voltesso is a balanced, round coffee that reveals biscuity notes and pronounces a distinctly sweet aroma thanks to its South American Arabicas. For an even smoother result, blend Voltesso with milk for a delicious new take
feature_bullets: LIGHT & SWEET: This Nespresso coffee is lightly roasted for a coffee that reveals biscuity notes and pronounces a distinctly sweet aroma thanks to its South American Arabica coffee beans

INTENSITY 4: This Nespresso coffee blend is lightly roasted for a balanced round coffee with a sweet, light taste and biscuity fragrance for an espresso with a sweet character all in easy to use Nespresso Capsules
VOLTESSO ESPRESSO BREWS 1.35 OZ : These Nespresso VertuoLine pods are part of the Espresso range that will provide you with a 1.35oz serving of a traditional espresso coffee beverage

WE RECYCLE: Nespresso aluminum capsules are fully recyclable and guarantee coffee freshness - we provide different options for recycling your used aluminum coffee pods to fulfill our collective commitment to protecting the environment

VERTUOLINE ONLY: Nespresso Vertuo delivers you a full range of cup sizes and coffee styles from espresso to Alto XL with easy to use Nespresso pods. Enjoy hot or pour over ice. (VertuoLine Capsules are not compatible with OriginalLine machines )

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
